text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide hl7.fhir.eu.imaging-r4

HL7EuImagingStudyReport

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.eu/fhir/imaging-r4/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.eu.imaging-r4

This guide describes how a Imaging Study Report can be represented in the European REALM.

name: HL7EuImagingStudyReport
title: HL7 Europe Imaging Study Report
description: This guide describes how a Imaging Study Report can be represented in the European REALM.
copyright: Used by permission of HL7 Europe, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

resource.name: Attachment model
resource.description: C.7 - EHDS refined base model for This type is for containing or referencing attachments - additional data content defined in other formats. The most common use of this type is to include images or reports in some report format such as PDF. However, it can be used for any data that has a MIME type.

resource.name: Attachments
resource.description: D.1 - EHDS refined base model for Document attachments

resource.name: CodeSystem for terminology used in Endpoint resources in the EU Imaging IG.
resource.description: This code system defines various codes used to define ValueSets for Endpoints within the HL7-EU imaging IG.

resource.name: Condition model
resource.description: C.15 - EHDS refined base model for A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern.

resource.name: Device model
resource.description: C.12 - EHDS refined base model for Device information

resource.name: Diagnostic Report Support Info Code System
resource.description: Code system for codes to be used in `DiagnosticReport.supportInfo` for imaging reports.

resource.name: DiagnosticReport supportInfo codes
resource.description: Codes to be used in `DiagnosticReport.supportInfo` for imaging reports.

resource.name: Dispense decline
resource.description: Explicit statement about declining the dispense request (prescription), usually recorded in order to communicate the issue back to the prescriber. Reasons for declining a dispense may vary, but typically this statement is only sent when a following action is expected on the prescriberâ€™s side (cancelling or changing the problematic prescription or the whole treatment).

resource.name: Document Bundle for Imaging Report
resource.description: Document Bundle for Imaging Report

resource.name: Document DiagnosticReport Reference
resource.description: This extension provides a reference to the DiagnosticReport instance that is associated with this Composition.

resource.name: Document header model
resource.description: EHDS refined base model for document header data elements, including the common header for all resources. Data relevant to document type and its content for administrative and searching purposes.

resource.name: DocumentReference.bodySite extension for R4
resource.description: Extension to backport DocumentReference.bodySite in R4.

resource.description: A DocumentReference profile for the EU.

resource.description: Extension to backport DocumentReference.modality in R4.

resource.name: Dosaging model
resource.description: Logical model for usage instructions for administring the requested product. Based on FHIR Dosage complex data type. When implemented, this model may be reduced significantly according to the specific use case.

resource.description: Units for Dose Length.

resource.description: C.29 - EHDS refined base model for Episode of care

resource.description: A allergyintolerance profile for the EU.

resource.name: EU BodyStructure
resource.description: BodyStructure profile for the EU

resource.name: EU CarePlan
resource.description:
Care plan for the patient. 
Contains the narrative containing the plan including proposals, goals, and order requests for monitoring, tracking, or improving the condition of the patient. In the future it is expected that the care plan could be provided in a structured and coded format.

resource.name: EU Composition
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a report for the scope of the HL7 Europe project.

resource.name: EU Condition
resource.description: A condition profile for the EU.

resource.name: EU Encounter
resource.description: A encounter profile for the EU.

resource.name: EU Endpoint
resource.description: The FHIR endpoint resource with EU specific references.

resource.name: EU Medication
resource.description: A medication profile for the EU.

resource.description: A procedure profile for the EU.

resource.description: A range profile for the EU.

resource.name: EU SimpleQuantity
resource.description: A simple quantity profile for the EU.

resource.name: Finding
resource.description: Finding during imaging procedure.

resource.description: C.25 - EHDS refined base model for Functional status

resource.description: Gestational Age Observation

resource.name: HL7 EU Document Types
resource.description: Document types (templates) as defined by HL7 EU. It identifies the type and template of the document.

resource.name: HL7 EU Imaging Manifest Types
resource.description: HL7 EU Imaging Manifest Types used in Compositions and DiagnosticReports.

resource.name: HL7 EU Imaging Report Types
resource.description: HL7 EU Imaging Report Types used in Compositions and DiagnosticReports.

resource.name: Hospital Discharge Report
resource.description: A - EHDS refined base model for Hospital Discharge Report

resource.name: Hospital Discharge Report header model
resource.description: A.1 - EHDS refined base model for Hospital Discharge Report header data elements

resource.name: Human name model
resource.description: C.27 - EHDS refined base model for Human name

resource.name: IM Image Viewer Endpoint
resource.description:
This profile defines a placeholder for an Endpoint for a viewer that can be used to access the study, serie it is present on.
The application is based on [IHE-IID](https://www.ihe.net/uploadedFiles/Documents/Radiology/IHE_RAD_Suppl_IID.pdf).

resource.name: Im Imaging Device
resource.description: The device the made the image.

resource.name: IM Imaging Order
resource.description: This profile on ServiceRequest represents the order for the Imaging Study and report.

resource.name: IM Imaging Patient
resource.description: This profile on Patient represents the Imaging Patient.

resource.name: IM Imaging Procedure
resource.description: This profile on Procedure represents the imaging procedure.

resource.name: IM Imaging Study
resource.description: This profile represents an imaging study instance.

resource.name: IM ImagingStudy Manifest
resource.description: This profile represents a manifest of an imaging study. It holds the ImagingStudy resource that mirrors the information in the DICOM study allow with other resources that are required to express the information in DICOM in FHIR.

resource.name: IM WADO Endpoint
resource.description: This profile defines the WADO endpoint for accessing imaging study content.

resource.name: Imaging Accession Number Identifier
resource.description: This profile on Identifier represents the Accession Number for the Imaging Order.

resource.name: Imaging Adverse Event
resource.description: Adverse Event that occurred during an imaging procedure.

resource.name: Imaging Composition
resource.description: Clinical document used to represent a Imaging Study Report for the scope of the HL7 Europe project.

resource.name: Imaging Device Type
resource.description: Imaging Device Type.

resource.name: Imaging Diagnostic Report
resource.description: Diagnostic Report profile for Imaging Reports. This document represents the report of an imaging study. It is the anchor resource that refers to all structured data as well as the `Composition` resource that contains the narrative text of the report.

resource.name: Imaging Key Image Document Reference
resource.description:
A document containing key images for a patient. It can refer to a DICOM or non-DICOM image. When referring to a DICOM image, the DocumentReference.content.attachment.url should be a WADO-URI. When referring to a non-DICOM image, the DocumentReference.content.attachment.url should be a direct URL to the image.

When the resource represents a DICOM instance it SHALL contain a the SOP Instance UID in the identifier element. When the resource represents a DICOM series it SHALL contain the Series Instance UID in the identifier element.

resource.name: Imaging Manifest Reports Provider/Creator
resource.description: This actor is responsible for creating/providing the Imaging Manifest resources.

resource.name: Imaging Procedure Type
resource.description: This value set includes all imaging procedure types.

resource.name: Imaging report body model
resource.description: B.1 - EHDS refined base model for Imaging report body

resource.name: Imaging report header model
resource.description: A.1 - EHDS refined base model for Imaging Report header data elements

resource.name: Imaging report model
resource.description: A - EHDS refined base model for Imaging Result Report

resource.name: Imaging Selection profile for R4
resource.description: Imaging Selection profile for R4

resource.name: Imaging Selection referring to a DICOM SR instance for R4
resource.description: Imaging Selection referring to a DICOM SR instance for R4

resource.name: Imaging SOP Class UID Identifier
resource.description: This profile on Identifier represents the SOP Class UID (0008,0018) for the Imaging Order.

resource.name: Imaging study model
resource.description: C.32 - EHDS refined base model for Imaging study

resource.name: Imaging Study Performer Type Value Set
resource.description: Imaging Study series performer type codes, it extends on the base set defined in the FHIR specification.

resource.name: Imaging Study Report Provider/Creator
resource.description: The actor responsible for creating/providing the Imaging Report resources.

resource.name: Immunization model
resource.description: C.24 - EHDS refined base model for Immunization

resource.name: Inpatient encounter model
resource.description: C.23 - EHDS refined base model for Inpatient encounter

resource.name: Instance Description
resource.description: A description of the instance in an ImagingStudy.

resource.description: Key images represented as an ImagingSelection for R4

resource.description: C.11 - EHDS refined base model for Observation performed by laboratory

resource.name: Laboratory order
resource.description: A - EHDS refined base model for Laboratory order

resource.description: B.1 - EEHRxF refined base model for Laboratory result report body

resource.name: Laboratory report model
resource.description: A - EHDS refined base model for Laboratory result report

resource.name: Location model
resource.description: C.17 - EHDS refined base model for Details and position information for a place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained, or accommodated.

resource.name: Manifest DocumentReference for MHD deployments
resource.description: A DocumentReference profile for the Manifest DocumentReference used in MHD deployments.

resource.name: Media model
resource.description: C.14 - EHDS refined base model for A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare.

resource.name: Media View types - placeholder for cross-version extension
resource.description: Codes defined in SNOMED CT that can be used to record Media Recording views.

resource.name: Media.view extension
resource.description: This cross version extension includes the FHIR R4 version of the Media.view field which has at this point in time (April 18, 2025), not yet been included in the extension pack.

resource.name: Medication administration model
resource.description: C.18 - EHDS refined base model for Medication administration

resource.name: Medication dispensation model
resource.description: Logical model for medication dispensation (based on request or independently)

resource.name: Medication dispense header
resource.description: Metadata elements for a header of medication dispense or dispense decline.

resource.name: Medication prescription header model
resource.description: Logical model for medication prescription header.

resource.name: Medication prescription model
resource.description: Logical model for medication prescription body. A prescription contains one or more prescription items.

resource.name: Medicinal product model
resource.description: Logical model for prescribed/dispensed medication. The model is shared by statements, requests, dispensations, and treatment lines. Each of those may have different restrictions in FHIR profile.

resource.name: Missing DICOM Terminology
resource.description: Code system for codes that are defined in DICOM but for which no matching code system is available in FHIR.

resource.name: Observation model
resource.description: C.10 - EHDS refined base model for Observation information

resource.name: Organization model
resource.description: C.3 - EHDS refined base model for Health provider or any other type of organization

resource.name: Patient model
resource.description: C.1 - EHDS refined base model for Patient/subject information

resource.name: Patient summary body model
resource.description: B.1 - EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary body data elements

resource.name: Patient summary header model
resource.description: A.1 - EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary header data elements

resource.name: Patient summary model
resource.description: A - EHDS refined base model for Patient Summary Report

resource.name: Patient: Animal
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent an Animal as subject of care in FHIR for the purpose of this guide. This is used (among others) to identify the species when a specimen is collected from an animal.

resource.name: Periods of Life
resource.description: A value set of periods of life extension ([SNOMED tree](https://browser.ihtsdotools.org/?perspective=full&conceptId1=767023003&edition=MAIN/2025-04-01&release=&languages=en)).

resource.name: Periods of Life Extension
resource.description: Allows to indicate a time period in a person's life as a reference to a coded value for that life period.

resource.name: Placeholder for IHE MHD Entry UUID Identifier in FHIR R5.
resource.description: entryUUID Identifier holding a UUID, based on [IHE-MHD R4](https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/MHD/StructureDefinition-IHE.MHD.EntryUUID.Identifier.html).

resource.name: Procedure model
resource.description: C.16 - EHDS refined base model for An action that is or was performed on or for a patient

resource.name: r4 DocumentReference for MHD deployments
resource.description: A placeholder for a DocumentReference profile for the IHE-MHD in r4.

resource.name: Radiation Dose Observation
resource.description:
A record for the radiation dose the subject has been exposed to during an imaging procedure.
E.g. based on information from https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part16.html and https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/fhir-radiation-dose-summary-ig/index.html

resource.name: Reasons a section in an imaging report is empty.
resource.description: Reasons a section in an imaging report is empty.

resource.name: Related person model
resource.description: C.13 - EHDS refined base model for Patient/subject guardian and other related person information

resource.name: RelatedPerson Eu
resource.description: EU Related Person.

resource.name: Report DocumentReference for MHD deployments
resource.description: A DocumentReference profile for the Report DocumentReference used in MHD deployments.

resource.name: Report header model
resource.description: EHDS refined base model for Report header data elements. Common for hospital discharge, laboratory and medical imaging reports.

resource.name: Resource header model
resource.description: Common header elements for all documents and their independently functioning parts, e.g FHIR resources.

resource.name: Service request model
resource.description: C.8 - EHDS refined base model for Specification of requested service or services

resource.name: ServiceRequest.reason extension for R4
resource.description: Extension to backport ServiceRequest.reason in R4.

resource.name: Slot model
resource.description: C.XX - EHDS refined base model for Slot

resource.description: C.9 - EHDS refined base model for Specimen information

resource.name: Specimen: Laboratory
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Specimens in HL7 FHIR for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: Study Instance UID Identifier
resource.description: This profile on Identifier represents the Study Instance UID (0020,000D) for the Imaging Order.

resource.description: C.28 - EHDS refined base model for Substance

resource.description: C.6 - EHDS refined base model for Telecommunication contact information structure
